scripts.sls:offline: export POWERTOOLS_DEV="true" && npm run build && sls offline start --stage development
scripts.publish:dist: npm run build && (cd dist && npm publish --registry=https://npm.pkg.github.com)
scripts.publish:beta: npm run build && (cd dist && node set-beta-version.js && npm publish --tag beta --registry=https://npm.pkg.github.com)
